name: American Slideshow
description:
Ever want to relive the traumatizing experience of Family Slideshow Night? Well now you can with American Slideshow.

This game's images are super high res with long load times. This is to facilitate the frustrating annoyance one feels during an actual slideshow. Just wait for it. It's coming.

If for some reason you enjoy this game, please consider donating and/or following Weird Text Based Games.
